Judul: Profficiency In Art (Phd) Educati on In Hacettepe University Faculty  Of Fine Arts Department Of Ceramic
Abstrak: This study  presents art education  in graduate programs in Turkey. And puts forth which programs and methods applied during the  graduate  education  in  the  aim  of  attaining  academic  artists  in  our  counry.  Hacettepe  University  Faculty  of  Fine  Arts  Department of Ceramic contributes this aim since its establishment. This study also presents all musts and methods of graduate art  education  by  an  example  of  a  Profficiency  in  Art  distertati on. This  example  distertation  was  completed  between  2008  and  2012 years by Berker withthe supervision of Prof. Dr. Terviel.
Kata Kunci: PhD in art, proficiency in art, dissertation
